results.title: Stratford on Avon
results.brief_description: Offers a colorful display of Tudor buildings and gardens. Ann Hathaway’s famous cottage, and Shakespeare’s birth-place, exemplify Tudor half-timbered architecture. Shows lively scenes such as the annual Mop Fair.

results.title: Strategy for survival: behavioural ecology of the monarch butterfly (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Offers a look at the nature of the behavioral and ecological interactions characteristic of life and focuses on the migratory and mating behavior of the monarch butterfly as well as on its ability to take over the chemical defense system of its food. Presents naturalistic observations and also demonstrates controlled experiments.

results.title: Strangers on a train
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures and Alfred Hitchcock
results.brief_description: Based on Patricia Highsmith’s chilling thriller, “Strangers on a train”, this is one of Alfred Hitchcock’s most suspenseful and exciting films. Two passengers accidentally meet on a train. Bruno Anthony (Robert Walker) offers to kill the wife of Guy Haines (Farley Granger), if Guy in return murders Bruno’s father. The excellent script was co-written by Raymond Chandler and the film features a climax in a fairground which is among Hitchcock’s finest directing moments.
results.description: Based on Patricia Highsmith’s chilling thriller, “Strangers on a train”, this is one of Alfred Hitchcock’s most suspenseful and exciting films. Two passengers accidentally meet on a train. Bruno Anthony (Robert Walker) offers to kill the wife of Guy Haines (Farley Granger), if Guy in return murders Bruno’s father. The excellent script was co-written by Raymond Chandler and the film features a climax in a fairground which is among Hitchcock’s finest directing moments.

results.title: Strangers in their own land
results.creator_credit: Chris Curling and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Examines Aboriginal land rights in the Weipa area of Northern Queensland, presenting both sides of the conflict between the Comalco bauxite miners and the Aboriginal people.
